long_description: This kit lets you mount bungee rigging under your cockpit deck for securing items inside. Do-it-yourself kit comes with instructions for 2 possible layout designs and proper installation. Works with both standard and composite watercraft materials. Mounting hardware is made from stainless steel. Kit contents: bungee cord (9 ft.), pad eyes (8), pad eye bolts (16), locking nuts (16), seal rings (16) and nylon bungee hooks (2).
short_description: This kit lets you mount bungee rigging under your cockpit deck for securing items inside.
